thread.title: Joel Embiid: T.J. McConnell as clutch as MJ

author: USA TODAY
title: Joel Embiid: T.J. McConnell as clutch as MJ
text:

Post to Facebook Joel Embiid: T.J. McConnell as clutch as MJ Twitter master Joel Embiid strikes again. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Nation's Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Joel Embiid: T.J. McConnell as clutch as MJ Alysha Tsuji , USA TODAY 10:32 p.m. ET Feb. 9, 2017 
Philadelphia 76ers' Joel Embiid (21) and T.J. McConnell (1) walk onto the court after a timeout during the second half of the team's NBA basketball game against the Charlotte Hornets, Friday, Jan. 13, 2017, in Philadelphia. Philadelphia won 102-93. (Photo: AP) 
T.J. McConnell hit another game-winner on Thursday night. With 5.8 seconds left, McConnell buried a short shot to beat the Magic. The bucket. The steal. The hair.üèÉüèª W E O U T üí® pic.twitter.com/Plb8OToUQA ‚Äî Philadelphia 76ers (@Sixers) February 10, 2017 
This comes a month after McConnell hit a game-winning buzzer-beater over Carmelo Anthony to beat the Knicks. After that shot, Sixers teammate Joel Embiid changed his Twitter avatar to a photo that compares McConnell to Michael Jordan. 
After this shot to take down the Magic and snap a five-game losing streak, Embiid sent out a tweet that claims McConnell is "the clutchest player in the history of the NBA" along with the the photo in his avatar. Is Tj Mcconnell is the clutchest player in the history of the NBA? I guess so #TrustTheProcess pic.twitter.com/JD6IoQ2J5v ‚Äî Joel Embiid (@JoelEmbiid) February 10, 2017 
Twitter master Embiid strikes again. Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/joel-embiid-tj-mcconnell-clutch-nba-michael-jordan-history-76ers/ Most Popular
